name: Inverse (cheeseghostie)
description:
Become immersed in the surreal monochromatic world of Inverse! Explore and complete mind-bending puzzles to collect all the gems and win.

Features
↠    3 levels of challenging puzzles
↠    A range of obstacles to beat
↠    Interesting atmospheric elements

Controls
↠    WASD to move
↠    Space to invert
↠    E to toggle switches

This game was made in a short time frame for a university project by a small group of software engineering and creative technology students.

Programmers - Bachelor of Software Engineering
↠    @seasaltcwackers
↠    Rui Guo

Artists - Bachelor of Creative Technologies
↠    @cheeseghostie
↠    Netana Ramsay

*Warning! This game features drastic colour shifting and rotating that could be triggering for some players.
